name: Spikedown Shutdown
description:
SPIKE DOWN SHUT DOWN

WASD/Arrow keys – move

Space- jump

Kill as many enemies as you can and get the amulet!

Jarred- Level designer/Programmer

Dan- Sound designer/Music

Kira- Artist

You are the protagonist searching for the lost amulet of great power! Not much is known about the magnitude of power the amulet possesses, but what is known is that many people have gone missing in search of it. You don’t care, all you care about is having it in your grasp and not letting any monster stop you!
